anthenol, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, disodium EDTA, melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil, madecassoside, centella asiatica (gotu kola) leaf extract, sodium hyaluronate, asiaticoside, limonene.

over skin. Follow with moisturizer.
